optimade.elements.name: optimade.elements
optimade.elements.description: Names of the different elements present in the structure.

optimade.nelements.name: optimade.nelements
optimade.nelements.description: Number of different elements in the structure as an integer.

optimade.elements_ratios.name: optimade.elements_ratios
optimade.elements_ratios.description: Relative proportions of different elements in the structure.

optimade.chemical_formula_descriptive.name: optimade.chemical_formula_descriptive
optimade.chemical_formula_descriptive.description:
The chemical formula for a structure as a string in a form chosen by the API
implementation.

optimade.chemical_formula_reduced.name: optimade.chemical_formula_reduced
optimade.chemical_formula_reduced.description:
The reduced chemical formula for a structure as a string with element symbols and
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

optimade.chemical_formula_hill.name: optimade.chemical_formula_hill
optimade.chemical_formula_hill.description:
The chemical formula for a structure in Hill form with element symbols followed by
integer chemical proportion numbers. The proportion number MUST be omitted if it is 1.

optimade.chemical_formula_anonymous.name: optimade.chemical_formula_anonymous
optimade.chemical_formula_anonymous.description:
The anonymous formula is the chemical_formula_reduced, but where the elements are
instead first ordered by their chemical proportion number, and then, in order left to
right, replaced by anonymous symbols A, B, C, ..., Z, Aa, Ba, ..., Za, Ab, Bb, ... and
so on.

optimade.dimension_types.name: optimade.dimension_types
optimade.dimension_types.description:
List of three integers. For each of the three directions indicated by the three lattice
vectors (see property lattice_vectors). This list indicates if the direction is
periodic (value 1) or non-periodic (value 0). Note: the elements in this list each
refer to the direction of the corresponding entry in lattice_vectors and not
the Cartesian x, y, z directions.

optimade.nsites.name: optimade.nsites
optimade.nsites.description: An integer specifying the length of the cartesian_site_positions property.

optimade.structure_features.name: optimade.structure_features
optimade.structure_features.description:
A list of strings that flag which special features are used by the structure.

- disorder: This flag MUST be present if any one entry in the species list has a
chemical_symbols list that is longer than 1 element.
- unknown_positions: This flag MUST be present if at least one component of the
cartesian_site_positions list of lists has value null.
- assemblies: This flag MUST be present if the assemblies list is present.

dft.xc_functional.name: dft.xc_functional
dft.xc_functional.description: The libXC based xc functional classification used in the simulation.

dft.system.name: dft.system
dft.system.description: The system type of the simulated system.

dft.compound_type.name: dft.compound_type
dft.compound_type.description: The compound type of the simulated system.

dft.crystal_system.name: dft.crystal_system
dft.crystal_system.description: The crystal system type of the simulated system.

dft.spacegroup.name: dft.spacegroup
dft.spacegroup.description: The spacegroup of the simulated system as number.

dft.spacegroup_symbol.name: dft.spacegroup_symbol
dft.spacegroup_symbol.description: The spacegroup as international short symbol.

dft.code_name.name: dft.code_name
dft.code_name.description: The name of the used code.

dft.code_version.name: dft.code_version
dft.code_version.description: The version of the used code.

dft.n_calculations.name: dft.n_calculations
dft.n_calculations.description: Number of single configuration calculation sections

dft.n_quantities.name: dft.n_quantities
dft.n_quantities.description: Number of metainfo quantities parsed from the entry.

dft.quantities.name: dft.quantities
dft.quantities.description: All quantities that are used by this entry.

dft.searchable_quantities.name: dft.searchable_quantities
dft.searchable_quantities.description: All quantities with existence filters in the search GUI.

dft.group_hash.name: dft.group_hash
dft.group_hash.description: Hashes that describe unique geometries simulated by this code run.

upload_id.name: upload_id
upload_id.description: A random UUID that uniquely identifies the upload of the entry.

calc_id.name: calc_id
calc_id.description: A unique ID based on the upload id and entry's mainfile.

calc_hash.name: calc_hash
calc_hash.description: A raw file content based checksum/hash.

pid.name: pid
pid.description: The unique, sequentially enumerated, integer persistent identifier

raw_id.name: raw_id
raw_id.description: A raw format specific id that was acquired from the files of this entry

published.name: published
published.description: Indicates if the entry is published

processed.name: processed
processed.description: Indicates that the entry is successfully processed.

last_processing.name: last_processing
last_processing.description: The datetime of the last attempted processing.

nomad_version.name: nomad_version
nomad_version.description: The NOMAD version used for the last processing attempt.

nomad_commit.name: nomad_commit
nomad_commit.description: The NOMAD commit used for the last processing attempt.

parser_name.name: parser_name
parser_name.description: The NOMAD parser used for the last processing attempt.

with_embargo.name: with_embargo
with_embargo.description: Indicated if this entry is under an embargo

upload_time.name: upload_time
upload_time.description: The datetime this entry was uploaded to nomad

datasets.dataset_id.name: datasets.dataset_id
datasets.dataset_id.description:
The unique identifier for this dataset as a string. It should be
a randomly generated UUID, similar to other nomad ids.

datasets.name.name: datasets.name
datasets.name.description:
The human readable name of the dataset as string. The dataset name must be
unique for the user.

datasets.doi.name: datasets.doi
datasets.doi.description:
The optional Document Object Identifier (DOI) associated with this dataset.
Nomad can register DOIs that link back to the respective representation of
the dataset in the nomad UI. This quantity holds the string representation of
this DOI. There is only one per dataset. The DOI is just the DOI name, not its
full URL, e.g. "10.17172/nomad/2019.10.29-1".

datasets.created.name: datasets.created
datasets.created.description: The date when the dataset was first created.

datasets.name: datasets
datasets.description: Search for a particular dataset by exact name.

dataset_id.name: dataset_id
dataset_id.description: Search for a particular dataset by its id.

last_edit.name: last_edit
last_edit.description: The datetime the user metadata was edited last.

atoms.name: atoms
atoms.description: The atom labels of all atoms of the entry's material.

only_atoms.name: only_atoms
only_atoms.description: The atom labels concatenated in order-number order.

n_atoms.name: n_atoms
n_atoms.description: The number of atoms in the entry's material
